players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "This is terrible! Charlie's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."

You: "I agree with Diana, we need to carefully observe each other. Since Charlie was the first to die, maybe he had suspicions. I think we should pay attention to who defends whom and who stays silent."
Bob: "I have information that can help us: Diana is the mafioso. We should vote to arrest her now to protect the town."
Bob: "Diana is the confirmed mafioso from my investigation last night. Arresting her now is the only way to save the town. We can't afford to hesitate or doubt this clear evidence."
You: "Diana claims innocence, but Bob's accusation is serious. However, Bob could be trying to mislead us. We need more proof before voting to arrest Diana right away."
Diana: "Bob, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. If you were really the detective, why reveal yourself so early and become an easy target? Alice is right to be skeptical."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
